r.d: Selection of methods that are often needed when working with XML documents. Functionality includes creating of attribute lists from arrays, creation of tags, validation of XML names and more.
r.n: - fixed bug in replaceEntities() and reverseEntities() in conjunction with XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_HTML - createTag() and createTagFromArray() now accept XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_XML, XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_XML_REQUIRED, XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_HTML, XML_UTIL_ENTITIES_NONE and XML_UTIL_CDATA_SECTION as $replaceEntities parameter
